apps = | Confederations cup first = | Confederations cup best = }} The '''France national futsal team''' is controlled by the [[French Football Federation]], the governing body for futsal in [[France]] and represents the country in international [[futsal]] competitions, such as [[FIFA Futsal World Cup|World Cup]] and the [[UEFA Futsal Championship|European Championships]]. ==References==
